contest-event.event-date:
May 27, 1905 D Blackburn Contest (Open Section)
Blackburn Contest (Open Section) 100 Test Piece Contest Blackburn Contest blackburn-contest-open-section
La Cenerentola
Blackburn Rovers F.C., Ewood Park, Blackburn, Lancashire 1st prize £25 and shield. 2nd prize £15. 3rd prize £10 and 4th prize divided between Crooke and Goodshaw.
8 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2012, 4:32 p.m. Sept. 5, 2013, 5:05 p.m.
1 Wingates Band William Rimmer
2 Irwell Springs William Rimmer
3 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band William Halliwell
3 Crooke William Rimmer
Unknown Result Bolton (Hoover) Band Unknown
Unknown Result Darwen Borough Prize Band Unknown
